full_summary:
================================

**Government Procurement Opportunity**

### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3979631723
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 26, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Publication Date:** May 2, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 28, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

### Tender Description

The Department of Employment and Social Development Canada is seeking the supply and delivery of label printers on an "as and when required" basis. The purpose of this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is to establish a single Standing Offer (SO) for the delivery of label printers to multiple destinations across Canada over a one year period from the SO issue date, with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods. The initial requirement is for the supply and delivery of approximately 350 label making printers.

### Commercial Information

* **Goods and Services Identification:** The goods and services to be procured consist of label printers, ink, and other related accessories.
* **NAICS Codes:** 335228 (Computer and peripheral equipment manufacturing) and 334511 (Printed Circuit Assembly Manufacturing)
* **Parent Categories:** Computer printers and industrial sign and label printers
* **National Trade Agreement Prospective Participant:** The procurement of this good/service may be subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and other relevant trade agreements.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The proposed offer will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Name:** Daphne Yu
* **Email:** [daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** None

### Tender Documentation

Tender documentation, including the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO), is available on the Discovery document server (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16151046?extsite=MTYxNTEwNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** May 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 26, 2023 at 14:00:00
